questions_answers.question: What is the name of the institution?
What is the academic year?
When was IIT Jammu founded?
How many initial programs were there?
What was the initial student intake?
How many current students are there?
How many BTech programs are currently offered?
How many MTech programs are currently offered?
How many MSc programs are currently offered?
How many Executive MTech programs are currently offered?
How many PG Diploma programs are currently offered?
How many PhD programs are currently offered?
What is the overview of undergraduate programs?
questions_answers.answer: IIT Jammu offers full-time residential BTech programs spanning four years.

questions_answers.question: What majors are available for undergraduate programs?
questions_answers.answer: Chemical Engineering, Civil Engineering, Computer Science and Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Materials Engineering, Mathematics and Computing, Mechanical Engineering

questions_answers.question: What is the overview of postgraduate programs?
questions_answers.answer: MTech, MSc, MS(R), and Executive MTech programs are available.

questions_answers.question: What specializations are available for MTech in Computer Science Engineering?
What specializations are available for MTech in Electrical Engineering?
questions_answers.answer: Communications and Signal Processing, VLSI Design

questions_answers.question: What specializations are available for MTech in Civil Engineering?
